# LeafProperty.ProcessorInfoAndFeatures.Features.AES property

Gets a value representing the key to retrieve the property value.

AES instruction set. A value of true indicates that the processor supports the AES instruction extensions.

Key Composition

* Leaf: ProcessorInfoAndFeatures
* Property: AES
* Unit: None

Return Value

Type: Boolean

```csharp
public static IPropertyKey AES { get; }
```
